name: Strategic Camera Queries
description: Basic but strategic RQL queries for testing specific functionality

queries.description: Simple attribute equality - Find cameras in Office location
Simple feature property equality - Find cameras with night vision enabled
Numeric comparison - Find cameras with temperature above 30Â°C
String pattern matching - Find cameras with firmware containing 'beta'
Array membership - Find cameras supporting 4K resolution
Logical AND - Find cameras in Office with night vision
Logical OR - Find cameras in Office OR Garage
Logical NOT - Find cameras NOT manufactured by Acme Corp
Nested object property - Find cameras with motion detection enabled
Array element access - Find cameras with first intrusion event
Multiple numeric conditions - Find cameras with good health (uptime > 200000, temp < 30)
String and numeric combination - Find HID cameras with signal strength > 60
Complex nested query - Find Office cameras with 4K support and night vision
Date range query - Find cameras with recent firmware updates
Array element existence - Find cameras with intrusion events
